headline: Will a Bigger Credit Line and Audit Expertise Change Paychex's (PAYX) Capital Structure Narrative?
summary: Paychex recently expanded its Board to 11 members, appointing former Cintas CFO J. Michael Hansen as an independent director and Audit Committee member, while also amending and extending its main revolving credit facilities, including increasing a 2017 unsecured line to US$1.00 billion through January 2031. The combination of added financial expertise on the Board and enhanced long-term liquidity suggests Paychex is sharpening its focus on capital structure and governance quality. Next,...
